Text:
"How sick does a culture need to be, when children are indoctrinated with pure hatred, and taught that it is OK to kill others simply because they have different religious beliefs?"


Well, USA does that too.

And how good of you to put this on all muslims.

USA does not attack people on the basis of different religious beliefs, the only people who like to claim that are ignorant leftists who wants to criticize the USA for other reasons but can not find the words or argument. They'll just throw out a weird accusation and hope some of it will stick. Pretty childish and not very convincing.

yes indeed, the muhammedans with their devil god faggot allah and his bride, his whore sister infidelity, had a retartded camel-fucking son the cripple mohammed. all towle-head faggots suck cock and try to sell their stinking whore sisters. death to the arab scum!!

pether - You seem to be mixing up certain people with a whole nation.  I'm sure there are some advocates of violence in certain groups within US but not the whole nation or even a large part of it. feels that way.  We do want revenge for the 9/11 attacks tho.  We want to rid the planet of those that perpetrated those attacks and those that supported them.  Unfortunately those numbers are growing so the end result will be Armageddon.
